graduationVideo.description: I had the opportunity to work with the former director of HETIC (Jean-Christophe BEAUX) to create and edit the graduation video for the 2017's promotion of HETIC.

hypatos.description: During my internship at Taikonauten, I made the development of the new website of Hypatos.

sesam.description: With a team of 6 students from HETIC, we developed an entrepreneurship project based on recruitment during 6 months.
sesam.title: Sesam

vendredi.description: During 2 years, I worked as a full stack web developer for the "Vendredi" platform. Technos used : Vuejs, TypreScript, Jest, Laravel, PHPUnit, Heroku, Github.

weisserRing.description: During my internship at Taikonauten, I worked on a winter animation for Weisser Ring. This animation may not appear if it's not winter time ‚ùÑÔ∏è
weisserRing.title: Weisser Ring - Winter animation

wizer.description: We had to create a product for a school projet about reading. We decided to think about an app which facilitate the storing the data of an article. I developed a mini-site to present this application project.
wizer.title: Mini site for an app
